data.name: IT-Tage
data.description: Die IT-Tage 2019 finden vom 09. bis 12. Dezember 2019 zentral an der Messe Frankfurt statt. Die Teilnehmer erwartet ein breites Spektrum an aktuellen IT-Themen.

relatedRecords.name: Silicon Saxony Day
relatedRecords.description: The 15th Silicon Saxony Day takes place at the BallsportArena Dresden on May 27, 2020. The biggest high-tech event in Saxony offers unique insight into future technologies and business solutions covering hardware, software and connectivity topics.
